banner.description: The GDX Division helps inform digital standards for web content, accessibility, forms, and design..

review.threatTextOne: Select this option if there is a threat/menace in the comment(s). No email will be sent. Contact

footer.body: The B.C. Public Service acknowledges the territories of First Nations around B.C. and is grateful to carry out our work on these lands. We acknowledge the rights, interests, priorities, and concerns of all Indigenous Peoples - First Nations, Métis and Inuit - respecting and acknowledging their distinct cultures, histories, rights, laws, and governments.
